name: Dragon Battle (itch)
description:
《Dragon Battle》 has a grand scene and epic drama, and the 3D screen will be the most vivid interpretation of American magic wind. The game has achieved the role switching in the battle so that each hero's role can be maximized. 《Dragon Battle》 is a unique and cool fight against the combination of "roaming" and "air warfare". It allows players to experience a new experience of three-dimensional combat.

《Dragon Battle》 has not only made breakthroughs in combat and operations, but has also been refreshing in terms of images, growth, and plots.
(1) Combat: multi-dimensional battles of cavalry and air combat
Players can ride in the game on the magic dragon full of magical dragons, manipulating the mysterious magic punish the demon, become the legendary Dragon Warrior, soaring between the horizon. 《Dragon Battle》 has added a cavalry and air combat. In the game, the player can become a knight, ride a mighty horse and kill the enemy. While experiencing the super-real combat feeling of the knife, the mount's attributes Additions and their powerful stunts are enough to make the player's battle more fun and passionate, allowing players to enjoy the unprecedented fighting pleasure.
(2) Screen: Full 3D game scene, extremely clear blue screen
The 《Dragon Battle》 game screen is extremely perfect in terms of weather, light, people, and rendering. With a high number of characters and large-scale high-precision maps, lifelike 3D characters and magnificent scene modeling, realistic lighting effects and dazzling skill effects, strive to create a magic masterpiece for players.
(3) Growth: Multi-line growth system
The 《Dragon Battle》 is not only an aid in battle, but also comparable to the protagonist. They have their own attributes, skills, occupational characteristics, and so on. Almost everything the protagonist can have, relative to the small The strength of partners, their growth is extremely simple - automatically grow as the protagonist level grows. Powerful partners, changing career choices, in the 《Dragon Battle》 in the choice of their protagonist career and fighting style partner, so that players have a shocking physical and mental combat experience.
(4) Partner: One-touch switching partner
The game has an unprecedented emphasis on the role of partners in the game. In the battle can be a key to switch partners. Different scenes, different enemies, different battles... and partner's one-click switching can play unlimited coordination and tactics. Advantages and disadvantages, restraint and anti-restraint, and victory and failure are sometimes between this key.
(5) Plot: The magnificent epic epic
《Dragon Battle》 and the mainland set the plot is extremely ambitious, the plot is compact, rich plot, hundreds of thousands of words of the plot background, equivalent to an official World of Warcraft novels. When darkness engulfs the last light, and when order ceases to protect the faith, will you choose light or darkness? As the Devil is about to recover, the Dawning Union and the Destruction Corps are still fighting for justice and destruction. Dwarf Berserker, Human Warrior, Sun Fairy Mage, Orc Assassin, and the four protagonists who were killed by the same fate meet each other. The sequel to the Battle of Mainland China also opened the curtain.
